name: Racer Xtreme
description:
Racer X(treme) is a high-speed 3D racing game to infinity.

Features:

* 3D infinite game with addictive gameplay
* Flexible procedural generation system (no level is the same)
* Best scores
* Integrated store to buy more spacecrafts
* 7 spacecraft you can buy

Controls (select in options):
- Tilt left or right to move OR
- Touch left or right on screen to move
